entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
